Q_DESC: C PROGRAM TO TOGGLE CASE OF ALL CHARACTERS OF STRING.Concept:Just convert lower case character in upper case and upper case character in lower case but first check that character is alphabet or not, if it is alphabet then do it.
TESTCASE_1:
Krce
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Entered string is: Krce
String after toggle case: kRCE
TESTCASE_2:
M Kumarasamy College of Engineering

###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Entered string is: M Kumarasamy College of Engineering
String after toggle case: m kUMARASAMY cOLLEGE OF eNGINEERING
TESTCASE_3:
gfhfRThgFHBvfghbvVv
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Entered string is: gfhfRThgFHBvfghbvVv
String after toggle case: GFHFrtHGfhbVFGHBVvV
